Created an attachment (id=21344)
The Browse.product file in question

Some changes had been made to the product file, for bug 86500.
Here's the modified version.
Note the suspicious line:
  <launcher name=""browser">
The extra quote is the culprit.

Not sure how the extra quote came to be there.  I did not previously modify the
file manually.  I tried going through my local history for the file to see when
it happened.  It appeared at the same time I added the line:
Special chars: &<>\"'
which got transformed to:
Special chars: &<>\"'

However, I wasn't able to reproduce the problem by doing this again.
